unpublishedAction.name: UpdateOrderQuery

actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE Orders SET
		Ordername = '{{update_order.fieldState.Ordername.isVisible ? update_order.formData.Ordername : update_order.sourceData.Ordername}}',
		Requirements = '{{update_order.fieldState.Requirements.isVisible ? update_order.formData.Requirements : update_order.sourceData.Requirements}}',
    Address = '{{update_order.fieldState.Address.isVisible ? update_order.formData.Address : update_order.sourceData.Address}}',
		Contact Name = '{{update_order.fieldState.Contact Name.isVisible ? update_order.formData.Contact Name : update_order.sourceData.Contact Name}}',
		Contact Details = '{{update_order.fieldState.Contact Details.isVisible ? update_order.formData.Contact Details : update_order.sourceData.Contact Details}}',
		Date = '{{update_order.fieldState.Date.isVisible ? update_order.formData.Date : update_order.sourceData.Date}}',
		ShipmentID = '{{update_order.fieldState.ShipmentID.isVisible ? update_order.formData.ShipmentID : update_order.sourceData.ShipmentID}}'
WHERE Ordername = {{order_table.selectedRow.Ordername}};

jsonPathKeys: update_order.fieldState.Contact Details.isVisible ? update_order.formData.Contact Details : update_order.sourceData.Contact Details
update_order.fieldState.Contact Name.isVisible ? update_order.formData.Contact Name : update_order.sourceData.Contact Name
